leasing.meta_title: Where are the best banks to apply for car leasing? Compare the interest with us
leasing.meta_description: Apply for car leasing with high credit limit now. Rabbit Care is ready to offer you the best choice of car leasing from Thailand's leading banks. Find out more information at rabbitcare.com

personal-loan.meta_title: Best personal loan deal in Thailand
personal-loan.meta_description: Looking for the best personal loan deal? Trusted Banks, offer low interest rates and flexible loan amounts. Get personal loan you need from Rabbit Care

terms_conditions.html_top:
Make sure you give us the chance to communicate with you the products and services, which are tailored to your lifestyle.


I consent to the collection, use, and/or disclosure of my Personal Data by Rabbit Care Broker Co., Ltd., companies under Rabbit's Data Ecosystem, and their affiliates, subsidiaries, and business partners for the following purposes:

  • (i) marketing and communications
  • (ii) data analytics services
  • (iii) for other businesses (such as digital marketing, banking and financial, and reward and loyalty programs, including their related products and services)

which we rely on consent basis as detailed in the Privacy Policy.
terms_conditions.html_bottom: Click "PROCEED" to agree to the Terms of Use of our services.

error.contact_support: You can contact our customer support, if your issues persist.

payment_options.title: How would you like to pay?
payment_options.tool_tip: You can choose your preferred payment option either one-time or instalment. You will only see the instalment payment option only when your premium reach the required minimum instalment amount.

success_page.thank_you:
Thank you for choosing rabbit finance.
Find below the summary and next steps for your policy underwriting.

failure_page.payment_was_not_success: Your payment was not successfully processed.<0></0>Please try to process your payment again.
failure_page.contact_support: You can contact our customer support, <0>if your payment issues persist.</0>

checkout.terms_and_conditions: I have read and agree to <0>the terms and conditions</0> for 0% Installment Payment Campaign. After order completion, our team will contact you for a consent form.

thank_you_page.thank_you: Thank you for choosing rabbit finance.<4/>Find below the confirmed contact information.<4/><4/>Our Insurance advisor will contact you to advise you on the selected quote.

thank_you_page.title: Thank you for completing our online application.
thank_you_page.subtitle:
Your information have been sent to the selected financial institutions and will be contacted within 1-3 business days.
If you have any further questions, call 1438.

rejection_page.title: Thank you for completing our online application.
rejection_page.subtitle:
We are sorry to inform that your profile is not qualified by the financial institutions.
If you have any further questions, call 1438.
